dict.string:
The Mobile Document Reader (Developer) Profile causes the system to return responses that allow you to test the Mobile Document Reader API without requiring a second device with a real mobile document added.
The system will return responses representing an artificial user, meaning the API responses do not contain data from a real person or driver's license. This profile will expire after 365 days.
The API responses will not contain any personally identifiable information of any user, and are to be used only for testing this API.
By enabling the Mobile Document Reader (Developer) Profile and receiving the generated files, you agree that you will not use the API responses for any purpose other than testing this API.
At all times, information received by Apple will be treated in accordance with Apple's Privacy Policy, which can be found at www.apple.com/privacy.
Apple Confidential Profile. Do not distribute. Not to be used or disclosed without permission from Apple. Copyright Â© 2024, Apple Inc. All rights reserved.
Enables simulated mobile document responses to be returned from the Mobile Document Reader API.
